name: Hands of Prayer
description: When I was moving from Florida to Washington, my mom and I drove cross country and visited family. I made the mistake of going to a church service while visiting my aunt that I was warned was “a little weird”. After witnessing violent crying on the floor in a hand-holding prayer circle, my 11-year-old self ended up in the Sunday school admitting I didn’t pray and was met with being touched by everyone there on the shoulders speaking in tongue. Children and adults - I didn't know anyone in the room at all. It was one of the most uncomfortable experiences I’ve had and I remember it vividly still to this day. I wanted to finally illustrate how that experience made me feel and how religion as a whole is not for me.
